entry.def: An early riser is someone who likes to get up early in the morning. A late riser is someone who likes to get up late.

example.ex: He was an early riser and he would be at the breakfast table at seven.
example.tran: 他习惯早起，7点钟就坐在桌前吃早餐。

entry.def: A riser is the flat vertical part of a step or a stair.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who rises (especially from bed);
2. a vertical pipe in a building
3. structural member consisting of the vertical part of a stair or step
